name: unreal
description:
Here you learn Introduction to Unreal Engine 5, Download and install Unreal Engine 5, Familiarize yourself with the UE5 interface
Create a new project and import some asset

name: unreal
description: Create beautiful landscapes using Unreal engine 5 editor. Checking the nanite usage and asset provided by Quixel Bridge

name: unreal
description: Learning about creatingbeautiful landscapes using Unreal engine 5 editor. Upload the level map with project file on GitHub repo and paste link in students channel with hashtag #cl-unreal-map to receive 800 karma points

name: unreal
description:
Learn the basics of UE5's visual scripting system, Blueprints
Create a simple Blueprint that moves an object in response to player input

name: unreal
description:
Create a basic character 
model rig it for animation
Import the character 
 your project and 
 set up basic movement

name: unreal
description:
To create render out cinematic footage as per your environment design. Must be an mp4 video.
Share the drive link of video in students channel with hastag #cl-unreal-cinematic to receive 1600 karma points

name: unreal
description:
Add some basic AI to your game environment
Create an enemy character that attacks the player

name: unreal
description:
Create a health system for your player and enemies
Add some collectible items to the scene
Create a game objective for the player to complete

name: unreal
description:
Experiment with advanced lighting techniques, such as Global Illumination and Ray Tracing
Add some particle effects to your scene

name: unreal
description:
Add some background music and sound effects to your environment
Experiment with UE5's audio tools to create immersive soundscapes

name: unreal
description:
Create a basic UI system for your game
Add some buttons and menus that allow the player to access different features

name: unreal
description:
Learn how to set up multiplayer networking in UE5
Create a basic multiplayer game mode

name: unreal
description:
Optimize your game's performance by adjusting settings and using LODs
Experiment with UE5's profiling tools to identify performance issues

name: unreal
description:
Use UE5's procedural tools to generate complex terrain
Create a complex level layout that challenges the player

name: unreal
description:
Use UE5's Sequencer tool to create cinematic cutscenes
Add some dialogue and voice acting to your game

name: unreal
description:
Polish your game environment by tweaking settings and adding final touches
Build your game and share it with others

name: unreal
description:
Now Develop a game with your theme interest with all you have learned till now 
And upload game file in GitHub repo and share link in students channel with hastag #cl-unreal-game for 3200 Karma points
